title: Which is the better choice between AIIMS Bhatinda and GMC Patiala? - Quora
tags: All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS)

response.answer_text: GMC patiala is old college , started in 1953 and give this country many good doctors ,on other side AIIMS bathinda started just now. If, I am in same situation I am going to choose gmc patiala. Pros of choosing aiims 1. U are getting AIIMS 2. Fees of aiims and gmc patiala have wide difference (punjab medical colleges have 7.8 lac package) Pros of getting gmc patiala You are with well organised college running well from many years. You get introduced with senior teachers and senior students .You get punjab quota for your neet pg.OPD is very high in gmc patiala and very good tertiary hospital in punjabThis is my views regarding choice between gmc patiala and aiims bathinda. If you want any further information ,free to contact me.
I would have chosen GMC patiala. It is a well established old reputed college and you will get extra benefit of Punjab state quota for pg. It is harder to fetch a PG seat than UG.
